Comfy top and flattering.

This top is adorable and fit perfectly. I've worn it twice since I bought it on July 1st 2024 its now July 16th. I put it in the washer both times. The fabric holds up well and doesn't wrinkle. The sleeves are really cute with the adjustable bow size. My only negative the button fell off with this last wash. I know, it's just a button, but for the price of this top my expectations were higher from a durability standpoint. Will I fix the button and keep wearing it? Yes, absolutely, but not everyone knows how to sew a button so I thought I'd put it out there.

I have had this on my wish list for a while now.  When I went to order it, my size was not available.  Grabbed it as soon as it was back.  It is a great year round blouse.  Cold months, a blaser or cardigan work great.  I seem to be between sizes, so it is a little extra roomy.  The one thing that is a pain are the sleeve bows.  I wish the were tacked in bow form.  As is typical for sleeve ties, they ope after a while.  You need someone to retie for you.  I plan to ties the bows and tack it in place. The v-neck is mot low, so it is appropriate for everything.  I prefer a bit of a modest top.  I am a 36C and there is plenty of room left for larger cups.  A padded bra fills out the shirt a little more, to really shows a nice figure with this style, with out being revealing or tight.  It is a light fabric that allows the body to have air.  Though, I do not recommend the white blouse for hot sweaty days.  I tend to have a cami underneath as I can get warm, just to help prevent some sweat staining.  Great fun shirt to mix up instead of the typical plain blouse you wear to work.  Though vintage styled, ir does not look old fashioned.  It is all in accessorising and how worn in an outfit.  I will likely order solid blouses in the future to coordinate with various bottoms, patterened or solid.  It just makes me smile more.  Fun without being goofy, shocking, or weird.

评论概述: This was a gift for my granddaughter.
评论详情: It took a while to get to me, and I'm not sure about the fit for my granddaughter, but she loved the design.  The fabric is definitely a warm weather one in my view.  There's no stretch.  It's not see-through, but it's thin in terms of warmth.  And most important, it's kinda girly and also that retro flair.
Beautiful shirt. I am a size 10,, my measurements are 36, 30, 39 and a medium fit great. Super cute shirt, but it is going to need an iron. Very happy with my purchase.

True to size and flattering around the bust line and shapes the waist too. Wear some cherry earrings and you are all set!

I'm usually a Medium in top (without buttons). Accidentally ordered my usual size, not taking the buttons into consideration and not only did this NOT button, but the top wouldn't close unless I forced it. Way too tight and it fit as far apart as a cardigan AND the arms were snugged.  Hate the polyester, cheap material but with the 2% viscose, it's a smidge bit not as "slippery" as polyester. 评论概述: Silky and cute, fits as expected
评论详情: I am 5' 4" and weigh 145 lbs. My measurements are 36-30-39.5 and I bought a medium. It fits great and tucks easily into pants and skirts. The fabric is silky and lightweight but also very delicate so wash on cold and hang dry. I don't how know long this shirt will last but I am hoping it will last more than 6 months.

评论概述: Pretty but not at all fitted
评论详情: This shirt is very pretty. The pattern and colors are spot on. Its not terribly sheer but wear a nude bra with it is a must. I put on an undershirt because i dont like to leave anything to chance.  There is NO stretch at all. Its very boxy and not very well fitted. I sized based on my waist measurement and got the size that was just a hair ( talking 1 cm) over my waist size because I was worried there would be little to no stretch and under wouldent work. Well it was huge. About 2-3 inches too big. I even double checked my measurements and the shirt measurements ( on the listing) to be sure after I got it in. I would have had to sew in several inches on the sides to make this shirt work. A button had fallen off in transit and was in the bag as well.  The shirt was well packaged with tissue paper and looked great. However due to the size issue and no stretch I decided to return it. I was really bummed because this is such a pretty shirt and I had some really great outfits planned but without some stretch I dont feel like its flattering on me even if I sized down. My body shape isnt very forgiving with no stretch.  Its very very pretty. I would recommend sizing down or be ready to exchange.
Good fit ordered L and wear a L (38D) fits well very little gaps with the buttons

评论概述: Fits way too small even ordering 1 size up
评论详情: Cute shirt, but fits extremely tight and the size is way too small as advertised. You would have to order 2-3 sizes larger.
Nice but would size down

Ordered medium.  Blouse much larger than indicated in size chart .I wear a 34C/36B bra, waist 29". The medium was much too big. Fit was more like a large. I have different Belle Poque blouse in medium,  and it fits true to size chart.  I reordered this blouse in small. It's really cute. I hope it fits
This shirt had a weird plastic/shiny satin kinda feel to it. It slid off my shoulders and I imagine it would be sticky to wear in the sunshine...
The sleeves fit way better than on other Belle products, it does pull across the chest a bit but safety pins fix that issue. It is adorable shirt.

The size chart isn't on point. According to the cart, an XL should fit me perfectly. It doesn't- there is no give in the bodice/waist, and the cut is not for anyone that has any sort of a tummy. If you need an XL due to bra size (I am a 40C/38D), this would be great, but the waist size is off by about 1 to 1.5 inches for it to fit me properly. It's smaller than the size chart indicates with no stretch in that area around the back- the buttons pull and it gives me gaposis from about an inch under my bust down my stomach, and my love handles are just OUT THERE, encased in cherry-print fabric like sausages. Thus, the two I purchased are being returned.  I compared this size chart to another one by this same company (I purchased three dresses from them, and they are a PERFECT fit), and I figured it was a safe bet. Just keep in mind that you should size up in this shirt if you are dressing for a rounder middle.

评论概述: Exactly what I wanted, at a fraction of the price!
评论详情: I have been wanting a black cherry, fifties style button-up shirt for years. Once I finally admitted to myself that I had gained weight, I looked to the one site that I could always rely on for larger clothes: ModCloth.  Not only has shipping to Alaska been set at $18 minimum per item, but $60 for a not quite similar shirt is ridiculous in this economy. I love, love, love this shirt, so so much! I have a 40D chest size, and while this shirt does not stretch, it buttons up cleanly in the front, and is well made. I can't wait to see what else this brand offers, because the price is exactly right.

评论概述: It's okay, but the ribbons are super annoying

Like, after two hours they unravel even after I tied them in nice bows. So it's a cute shirt, but it inconveniences me at work, makes me look unprofessional and requires too much maintenance, so it's going to the back of my closet.
In theory this shirt is super cute. However, it's intended to be super tight, it's incredibly sheer, and if you have boobs at all, you're gonna be popping buttons and falling out of this shirt.

This should be a 5 star review but the cheap material brings it to a 2.  And for the price I can deal with lower quality materials but the item’s pictures portray false advertising.  I ordered the black with red cherries. The material is a super cheap printed polyester.  A black shirt printed on a white or greyish material!  And guess what, that shows at the edges of the neckline!  Now look at how their picture looks—you can see the inside of the shirt and the pattern is on the inside as well!  Such a shame because it fits great and is very flattering, but can’t hide the lack of quality.
